Reviews.Content: stayed doubletree san valley impressed hotel service conveniently located freeway close restaurants hotel kept friendly staff smooth checkin comfortable spacious receive warm chocolate chip cookie arrival nice touch pay overnight parking 14 day free ready requested checkin 11th floor hhonors kept spacious comfortable bed pillows coffee maker wolfgang puck coffee plus heading morning bathroom size neutrogena products forgot soothing shower robes hairdryer iron board closet street trolley takes gaslamp attractions plan return san diego soon book

Reviews.Title: “OK for some things, not great for others.”
Reviews.Author: Sam_Callahan
Reviews.Content: stayed conference held hotel decent location trolley line hazard center stop getting downtown easy sans auto trolley youll hear trolley dinging regularly itll wake lighter sleepers attached mall couple restaurants bookstore couple groceries beyond beefs smelled people couldnt explain shuttle airport joke charge airport shuttle runs hour hour words probably clean reasonably date internet fee thats thumbs grow doubletree nice exercise facility 4 treadmills 3 steppers lots free weights weight equipment bike disappointing indoor outdoor pools whirlpool looked decent sauna overall stay decent acceptable id id look choosing return
